timeline.message:
Improvements for Dart interpolated strings

The Dart tokenizer was incomplete, resulting in some strings that use
string interpolation not being parsed correctly. This has been worked
around by making sure that the contents of string interpolation are all
included in the same string token.

timeline.bodyText: So '$' is not a valid literal, correct?
timeline.author: oowekyala

replies.bodyText: Indeed, that's my understanding. You can either use the dollar sign for string interpolation, or escape it with a backslash character. The previous grammar was a bit too lenient in this regard.
replies.author: maikelsteneker
